member.name: T:CsvHandler.Tests.AotCompatibilityTests
member.summary: Tests to ensure AOT (Ahead-of-Time) compilation compatibility and trim safety. These tests verify that the library works without reflection and generates warnings-free code for Native AOT scenarios.

member.name: M:CsvHandler.Tests.AotCompatibilityTests.Assembly_CoreTypes_DoNotRequireDynamicCode
member.summary: Verifies the dual-path AOT strategy: 1. Core types (Utf8CsvParser, CsvContext, etc.) are AOT-compatible 2. Reflection fallback types are properly marked as incompatible 3. Library supports both AOT and reflection-based usage

member.name: M:CsvHandler.Tests.AotCompatibilityTests.CsvReader_AotSafeMethods_DoNotRequireDynamicCode
member.summary: Verifies the dual-path API design for CsvReader: 1. AOT-safe path: Create(Stream, CsvContext) - no reflection 2. Reflection path: Create(Stream) - convenience, marked as incompatible

member.name: M:CsvHandler.Tests.AotCompatibilityTests.AotUsagePattern_Documentation
member.summary: Documents the recommended AOT usage pattern for consumers of this library. This test serves as both verification and documentation.

member.name: T:CsvHandler.Tests.IntegrationTests
member.summary: Integration tests for end-to-end CSV processing scenarios, including real-world file handling, large datasets, and edge cases.

member.name: T:CsvHandler.Tests.ParserTests
member.summary: Comprehensive tests for Utf8CsvParser covering RFC 4180 compliance, SIMD/scalar code paths, and various edge cases.

member.name: T:CsvHandler.Tests.PerformanceBenchmarks
member.summary: Performance benchmarks for CsvHandler using BenchmarkDotNet. Run with: dotnet run -c Release --project tests/CsvHandler.Tests/CsvHandler.Tests.csproj --filter *PerformanceBenchmarks*

member.name: T:CsvHandler.Tests.BenchmarkRunner
member.summary: Helper class to run benchmarks from unit tests.

member.summary: Tests to verify that netstandard2.0 polyfills work correctly and provide feature parity with modern .NET versions.
